EmailTemplate.subject: We want your feedback on our new themes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We hope you’ve been enjoying your experience with Bigcommerce. As we work on new features, we like to reach out to customers to get their thoughts.
Today, we would love to hear what you think about our new themes. Can you please take 5 minutes to give us some feedback?
Take our survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/ZYZGSHF]]>
We’d greatly appreciate hearing from you.
Thanks again for your business, and for helping to shape the future of Bigcommerce themes.
The Bigcommerce Team
